articles.author: Frank Diamond
articles.title: Move over B117, Here Comes Another COVID Mutation - Infection Control Today
articles.description: Just how much more serious of a threat South Africa’s 501Y.V2 COVID variant represents has yet to be definitively answered, but British health officials argue that it’s much worse than the UK’s B117.
articles.content: B117 has now been spotted in 37 countries altogether, including the United States in Florida, California, and Colorado so far. In response, many countries have issued travel restrictions on planes co… [+3391 chars]

articles.author: Andreas Rinke, Nikolaj Skydsgaard
articles.title: Germany, Denmark mull delaying second COVID-19 vaccine shot - Reuters
articles.description: Germany was weighing on Monday whether to allow a delay in administering a second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine from BioNTech and Pfizer to make scarce supplies go further, after a similar move by Britain last week.

articles.title: UK scientists worry vaccines may not protect against S.African coronavirus variant - Reuters
articles.description: UK scientists expressed concern on Monday that COVID-19 vaccines being rolled out in Britain may not be able to protect against a new variant of the coronavirus that emerged in South Africa and has spread internationally.
